tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr. Raju Vaishya for rheumatoid arthritis from which I was suffering from years. He examined the joint in detail and took one for knowing the current status. He explained everything about what has gone wrong , discused about the available options. On the basis of my experienc with Dr. Raju Vaishya I can say that Doctor is very patient caring. he is a very great Listener & suggests solutions. For me he is the true God in human form. A well maintained hygenic environment throughout. His fees also were very nominal rather below the standard fees charged by others. He explains the root cause of the problem and the pros & cons of the curative & preventive measures.The doctor explained the problem appropriately and suggested necessary exercises to fasten the healing of the joint. 
My heartfelt thanks to him for all his guidance and support. I would definitely recommend him for any orthopaedic problem. my experience with Staffs of Dr. Raju Vaishya was satisfying.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I felt very positive the way he handled the case. He is someone who won't give you medicine unless it is necessary. Very polite in nature, communicating your problems becomes easier. He listened to our issues very patiently n explained everything in detail. We were is so much of stress due to medical reports but he cleared our doubts n relieved our stress. He listened to my queries and assure proper solution. Half my tension was gone after talking to him. The doctor also described the test results in an encouraging manner. Listens a lot and then build up the opinion on medication after looking at reports.
In my opinion, the most important thing for any doctor is that he should Have is patience to listen, understand and then recommend. And post consulting doctor Dr. Raju Vaishya I can surely recommend him to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have a problem in Knee. Dr. Vaishya diagnosed the problem without any test. The Doctor was very nice and warm. Very satisfied with the treatment. Very Good experience. The doctor understood my symptoms first. Doctor gave an excellent description of the problem, the potential options and success rate of the options in a way I would understand. Doctor friendliness. We are lucky to have been to such a wonderful Doctor. He knows the art of making patient comfortable to talk. He treats with most caring nature. He is one who know how to get the situation back on track. My words are less to express my feelings.

tags: None
review: He is a commercial doctor who will suggest you methods or surgeries which you don't even require. I had some foot deformity for which he suggested a surgery called triple arthrodesis and he said I will be fine after three months. It's been six months and still I can't walk with out pain. On top of that he doesn't care how much pain I feel saying that he did his job right rest he doesn't know. HE IS 100% COMMERCIAL DOCTOR WHO IS ONLY AFTER your money.  Even today he suggests me to go for surgeries for my other foot. I used to run and go gumming but now I can't even walk. I so regret meeting him . Please look for any other doctor but not him

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My relative came specially from Afganistan to consult Dr Raju Vaish for his knee problem. He is feeling better after the lubricant injection procedure done by Dr Vaish himself. Also the medicines and supplements prescribed are suiting him and he is feeling good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I  reside in Bijnor about  165 km. AWAY  FROM  APOLLO  Hospital.  It  is  the trust  in the  Docter Raju Vaishya that encourages  me to go to him and  seek his advice. His  advice  and assurance  keep the  patient  reassured and  satisfied.  He is  a very  able  doctor  and  knows  how  treat a patient. I fully  trust  him and  that  is why  I go all the way  from  Bijnor to Apollo whenever  I need  medical  supervision. Thank you Doctor  for your  help

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a car crash injury. Visited some surgeons and was advised leg debridement. On some relative advise I went to Dr Raju Vaish in delhi. I am so fortunate that he has saved my leg. Now it has healed and almost normal. He is a professor ** **** **** ******** ********* *** surgical experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Vaish saved my life and saved me from suffering of hip joint pain which none of the doctors were able to diagnose and he did , ** ** * *** *** a savior to me , i cannot thank him enough .As a proof after the surgery i have no pain even after 3 years of his operation. He gave an alternative to joint replacement considering the young age. There is no day that pass by for me without thinking of his miracle
Thank you doctor and keep saving lives :).

tags: None
review: I went to Dr. Raju for my mother‚Äôs shoulder pain, I think Dr. Raju diagnosis was well but I was shocked when I asked for the breakdown of the charges of injections. The injection cost was just Rs. 200 but to inject it by Dr.Raju I was charged Rs.4,000 which was very high for me. I think patient should be well informed about the  break of the treatment and should give option to avail it or not avail it if it is over and above of the budget. Injections charge of Rs.4,000 in addition to constantly fees of Rs. 1,200 is too much for any middle class person like me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor seems more interesting in playing the chess online in the presence of patient. He has no regard for the patient...
I am avoiding visiting him third time, I felt like humiliated with my sister who is suffering from neck pain from past 3 years, when we were in his chamber and he was like speaking a word with us and then moving to his mobile and then again to us.
